content: Turning Off PageRank in the Google Toolbar Search Engines By: Rand Fishkin February 2, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin February 2, 2006 Turning Off PageRank in the Google Toolbar Search Engines The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Just a quick question for readers - how long did it take you from when you first learned about SEO to install the Google toolbar and check out PR on every site? And, conversely, how many weeks/months/years until you uninstalled it? For me, it was about 10 days into first learning about SEO back in 2002 that I installed the toolbar. It wasn't until July-August of 2004 that I finally got rid of the thing entirely. Now the only time I use PR is for the tools, and even then, it's just one piece of a rough calculation. Copied! Back to Top
